title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of players, with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Number of players has increased over the Year
Number of players is roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2017/18.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
Max Number of players about 76387.0 was recorded at Year 2016/17
Min Number of players about 56626.0 was recorded at Year 2011/12
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of players, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2010/11 to 2014/15.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016/17 to 2017/18.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015/16 to 2016/17.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014/15 to 2015/16.
